<%- include('sidebar') %>
Category Management
<% categories.forEach((category, index) => { %> <% }) %>
# Category Name Status Edit List/Unlist
<%= index + 1 %> <%= category.name %> <%= category.isDeleted ? 'Blocked' : 'Active' %>
